name: Eiffel Tower
longDescription: The Eiffel Tower, an iconic landmark in Paris, France, is a global symbol of love and romance. Enjoy breathtaking views of the city from its top.

name: Machu Picchu
longDescription: Machu Picchu, an ancient Incan city set high in the Andes Mountains of Peru, is one of the most iconic archaeological sites in the world.

name: Great Barrier Reef
longDescription: The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system, located off the coast of Queensland, Australia. It's a paradise for divers and marine enthusiasts.

name: Serengeti National Park
longDescription: Serengeti National Park in Tanzania is renowned for its vast savannahs and diverse wildlife, including the Big Five. Experience thrilling safaris here.

name: Taj Mahal
longDescription: The Taj Mahal, an ivory-white marble mausoleum in Agra, India, is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and an architectural marvel, symbolizing eternal love.

name: Grand Canyon
longDescription: The Grand Canyon in Arizona, USA, is a steep-sided canyon carved by the Colorado River. It offers breathtaking panoramic views and hiking trails.

name: Petra
longDescription: Petra, a historical and archaeological city in southern Jordan, is famous for its rock-cut architecture and water conduit system. Explore ancient wonders here.

name: Santorini
longDescription: Santorini, a picturesque island in the Aegean Sea, is known for its stunning sunsets, white-washed buildings, and crystal-clear waters. A perfect romantic getaway.

name: Marrakech Medina
longDescription: Marrakech Medina, a vibrant and colorful market square in Morocco, is a sensory delight. Immerse yourself in the rich culture, spices, and textiles.

name: Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park
longDescription: Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park in Australia is home to the iconic sandstone monolith Uluru and the red domes of Kata Tjuta. Discover Aboriginal culture and natural wonders.

name: Kyoto
longDescription: Kyoto, Japan's ancient capital, is a city of temples, traditional wooden houses, and stunning gardens. Experience the beauty of cherry blossoms and historic shrines.

name: Iguazu Falls
longDescription: Iguazu Falls, located on the border of Argentina and Brazil, is a breathtaking series of waterfalls surrounded by lush rainforest. Experience the power and beauty of nature.
